about_the_game:
Klaif and his loved one have been looted by some greedy, unknown group. His loved one has been abducted and he must find her. Players take on the role of Klaif, an ancient vampire.

The journey begins at night, in a graveyard somewhere near Rome. The whole area has changed since Klaif was on the surface, and he is furious at the locals for being looted. How did anyone let this happen? Someone knew his resting place was there, and he wanted to rest in peace with his loved one Duchess Vanda.


Players use a mouse + keyboard to control the game; click on the vampire units and construct buildings to hire more units if necessary, to give orders to units, zoom in or out and change the speed of time. It's a real-time strategy game, featuring vampires. During the game, players can experience haunted landscapes with the occasional town to explore with unsettling music.

As master vampire, players decide who lives, dies or is turned to a vampire. They can choose to go on a violent rampage and complete empty of human life, or use various spells to avoid any conflict and get through the level. If Klaif or Vanda get eliminated, the game ends after a short time.


Players are able to build structures, such as storage for blood, coffins for protection, and for different types of vampires. The enemy human buildings are locked until activated by another human. Human buildings include mana draining structures, and vampire hunters - the scenery buildings are decorative and can be avoided. Then players can raise the human buildings to the ground depending on the chosen strategy or tactic by the player.

The mini map can help players find the specific areas of the map to identify targets and complete levels.

Various vampire types are available to buy, and during the story the player unlocks them as every stage is complete. They cost mana and blood, and have different abilities with resistance to the sun. However every vampire is effected by the sun and can be burned away. All vampires can use the blood storage and coffins for health and mana rejuvenation by being in the zone of the structure.


In this world, players can order vampires to bite and turn enemy humans into vampires. Vampires can use a spell for haste or create the illusion of being a human and transform into a bat.

Enemy human CPU units in the game are either unarmed, or have crucifixes, holy water, wooden stakes and pistols to defend themselves. On every level there are patrols of enemy units to either destroy, turn into vampires or avoid. On occasion, there are also the other creatures of the night such as lycans and the undead. The game is straight forward with 'how to play' hints and tips accessible on every level, and may receive updates.

--------------------------------------------
Don't forget to join the discord server:
The current version is available for PC.
Rated M15+
Some icons in the game are modified AI generated images.



Gratias tibi!
